snippet: Security Council ambassadors outlined measures toward a resolution on Syria, backing an Arab League plan for political change after they dropped a specific reference to President Bashar al-Assad’s ceding of power.
lead_paragraph: Security Council ambassadors outlined measures toward a resolution on Syria, backing an Arab League plan for political change after they dropped a specific reference to President Bashar al-Assad’s ceding of power.

headline.main: Proposed Security Council Resolution on Syria
